price: 23.Kaadu Nabiyow abtam faxxaamak, diggah anu beera woh abeyyo maxcin.
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
